page.title: 14POLICE WORK IN TYWARDREATH
page.content: Our area comes within the{Devon and {Cornwall Force.} The area{ {head-quarters are at Exeter}and the{ {Divisional Control Room is at {Launceston.} That is where 999 calls go and where radio calls come from. There are two police houses at Tywardreath and a{Police Station.} It has a front office and general offices but no cells. For this people are taken to St. Austell where they are also finger-printed and photographed. We have 5 policemen who drive panda cars, 2 community policemen, 2 sergeants and a C.I.D. member. They work an 8 hour shift system and the work is unpredictable: it could be an accident, a burglary or a missing person. {Crime is rare,}mostly vandalism, as there is a strong community feeling.
